mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FONT_NO, FONT_NAME ,FONT_PATH ,FONT_CREATER , NVL(COUNT_NO,0) FONT_COUNT_NO , CASE WHEN FONT_NO IN (SELECT GOODS_NO FROM MEMBER_OWN_GOODS WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{loginMemberNo} AND SHOP_CATH_NO = 1) THEN FONT_NO ELSE 0 END AS GOODS_NO FROM FONT_SHOP F LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT_NO, GOODS_NO FROM MEMBER_OWN_GOODS WHERE SHOP_CATH_NO = 1 GROUP BY GOODS_NO ORDER BY COUNT_NO DESC ) S ON (F.FONT_NO = S.GOODS_NO) ORDER BY FONT_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FONT_NO, FONT_NAME ,FONT_PATH ,FONT_CREATER , NVL(COUNT_NO,0) FONT_COUNT_NO , CASE WHEN FONT_NO IN (SELECT GOODS_NO FROM MEMBER_OWN_GOODS WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{loginMemberNo} AND SHOP_CATH_NO = 1) THEN FONT_NO ELSE 0 END AS GOODS_NO FROM FONT_SHOP F LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT_NO, GOODS_NO FROM MEMBER_OWN_GOODS WHERE SHOP_CATH_NO = 1 GROUP BY GOODS_NO ORDER BY COUNT_NO DESC ) S ON (F.FONT_NO = S.GOODS_NO) WHERE FONT_NO != 1 ORDER BY FONT_COUNT_NO DESC, FONT_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT COUNT(FONT_NO) FONT_COUNT FROM FONT_SHOP WHERE FONT_NO != 1

SELECT FONT_NO, FONT_NAME ,FONT_PATH ,FONT_CREATER , NVL(COUNT_NO,0) FONT_COUNT_NO , CASE WHEN FONT_NO IN (SELECT GOODS_NO FROM MEMBER_OWN_GOODS WHERE MEMBER_NO = 3 AND SHOP_CATH_NO = 1) THEN FONT_NO ELSE 0 END AS GOODS_NO FROM FONT_SHOP F LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT_NO, GOODS_NO FROM MEMBER_OWN_GOODS WHERE SHOP_CATH_NO = 1 GROUP BY GOODS_NO ORDER BY COUNT_NO DESC ) S ON (F.FONT_NO = S.GOODS_NO) WHERE FONT_NO != 1 ORDER BY FONT_NO DESC
